snippet.title: Beyond Eyes: Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Get a first glimpse at Beyond Eyes, a game from Tiger & Squid in which you play as Rae - a blind girl leaving the safety of her garden to search for her lost feline friend.

Beyond Eyes is coming soon.

For info on Beyond Eyes, you should follow the developer's Twitter account at http://twitter.com/BeyondEyes_

Subscribe for more indie game videos from Team17, and leave us a like if you're a fan of Beyond Eyes!
